action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler (for himself, Mr. Van Drew, Mr. Kean, Mr. Ryan, Mr. Gottheimer, Mr. Latimer, Ms. Malliotakis, Ms. Sherrill, Ms. Pou, Mr. Hurd of Colorado, and Mr. Mills) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to designate September 11 Day of Remembrance as a legal public holiday.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the September 11 Day of Remembrance Act.

section.header: September 11 Day of Remembrance as a legal public holiday
section.text: Section 6103(a) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the item relating to Labor Day the following:
